span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 有教养的，不粗俗的： free from vulgarity or rudeness
【例】 Her genteel behaviors at the ball make others conjecture that she must come from a distinguished noble family. 舞会上她极有教养的举止让他人纷纷猜测她一定来自名门望族
【近】 courteous, decent, decorous, mannerly, polite, polished, respectable, urbane, couth, cultured, refined
【反】 churlish 粗暴的；loutish 蠢笨的

【记】 gentle 温和
【另】 gentleman 先生
